Class WindowsPS4Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.controller.PS4Controller
      • org.mini2Dx.core.controller.ps4.WindowsPS4Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.controllers.ControllerListener, MdxController<PS4ControllerListener>

    public class WindowsPS4Controller
extends PS4Controller
